title: Sollu Sollu Chellamma Song Lyrics Natpadhigaram 79
stanzas: <div>Sollu Sollu Chellamma Song Lyrics Natpadhigaram 79

sollu sollu sollu sollu
sollu sollu sollu sollu
sollu sollu ...

sollu sollu sollu sollu
sollu sollu sollu sollu

sollu sollu sollu sollu
chellammaa
nee unma unma unma
unma sollammaa (2)

Besant nagar beachula
kadala pottaan maapula
ulla vantha kadhala
miratturaanda beerula

ada andaa gundaavellaam
naan adagu vachchen daa
akkam pakkam ellaame
solli solli vachchen daa

kalatti vittaa da
enna kavuthuputta daa

avala nenjula nenjula
vachen vachen maamu
ava panjula panjula
theeya vachaa maamu

ava enna enna thaedi
vandhaa santhula
naan adhuku idhukkum
edhukkum ippa anjala

naan konjam konjam
konjam kooda nambala
ava killli thaandu
aaduraada nenjula.

avalo paandi bazaaru
ivano barmaa bazaaru
ada rendu perum
paarthukitta romba bejaaru

avalo INOX theatreu
ivano koovam wateru
ada rendu perum
onnaa ninnaa romba
tortureu

sunda kanjiyoda rusi
sudu soaru ariyaathadaa

adadaa roatoram koththu
kari pola namma payyan
sonna paecha kaetkaama
piece-u aanaandaa

avalo paakkathaan
kanni vedi pola
vandhu ninnu
nenjukuli nogadichaadaa

nillu nillu nillu nillu
tellu tellu tellu tellu

sollu sollu sollu sollu
chellammaa
nee unma unma unma
unma sollammaa

nee beeda poadudaa
oru gaanaa paadudaa
ada angae ingae thaedi
paaru valaiyil sikkumdaa

avalo arabi kudhiradaa
romba alaikazhipaa daa
ada agilu pigilu sevulu
ellaam egiripogum daa

avalo azhagaana thaer
thaanadaa
izhuthu theruvil vududaa
adadaa adadaa adadaa

nee paarkum ponnukkona
pudikkaatti thappu illa
vera oru super figure
thaedi varum da ..machi

anaikathaan onnum illa
arachaachi peggukulla
rummum dhammum
ippo nammala kaakkum saamidaa

sollu sollu sollu sollu
chellammaa
nee unma unma unma
unma sollammaa
